spec.name: Fraternity Square
spec.description: Fraternity Square (Place de la Fraternit√©) is a public square located in the central district of Casablanca. As a key gathering space, it is part of the city's planned urban environment developed during the French Protectorate. The name, emphasizing fraternity, reflects civic values. It functions as a local hub for socializing, relaxation, and provides pedestrian access to surrounding commercial and residential areas.
items: monument or fountain (typical of public squares)
